title: Stunning Alcove 1-Bedroom at Motiv Apartments!
posting_body: ['Stunning Alcove 1-Bedroom at Motiv Apartments #211', 'Property Address', '1006 West 24th Street - 211 | Minneapolis, MN 55405', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'At Home Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Walk, bike, or relax near the lakes and grab a latte on your adventure through the Uptown and Lowry Hill neighborhoods.', 'Enjoy walking and biking access to everything in Uptown- and easy transit options to go everywhere else.', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'All apartments offer modern and convenient living.', 'The building has free bike storage in the bike garage and a rooftop patio with a community grill.', 'Metro transit commuters have stops within two blocks of the building and drivers can easily access the main highways.', 'This modern 1-bedroom is an alcove unit with an open concept and west-facing windows.', 'It features highly customizable Ikea PAX closets, an in-unit washer and drier, central air, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and microwave.', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'Parking is available for $50/month for a surface space, and $125/month for a garage space.', 'Cats are welcome with a $200 pet deposit, $200 pet fee, and $35/month pet rent per cat (max 2).', 'County: Hennepin • School District: Minneapolis', '**Admin fee of $150 due at the lease signing**', 'Call the Motiv Leasing Office at', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Additional photos and availability at
